dataType.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.prot.EquipmentSwitchReason
dataType.description: This enumeration reflects the reason why a switch occurred.

value.name:
NOT_APPLICABLE is used, if a more precise value is not available.

This literal has value "NOT_APP

MANUAL indicates a switch that was requested by the operator and includes forced switches.

This lit

EQUIPMENT_FAILURE is used when an instance of equipment has failed.

This literal has value "EQUIP

dataType.label: EquipmentSwitchReason
